question: Which country houses the "Emba Soira Mountain"?
explanation: Emba Soira Mountain is a mountain located in Debub region of Eritrea. The Eritrean Highlands forms the parent range of Emba Soira. It is the highest mountain in Eritrea, which is 3018 metres high above sea level. Recently, this mountain was in the news because of the construction of a military listening post allegedly by Israel in the mountain.
